topic.title: B&B Theatres
topic.shortdesc: This portion will be displaying background information and features of the B&B Theater in Christiansburg.

image.alt: Image of the front of B&B Theater

section.title: Context
section.p: B&B Theatres was founded in 1980 when two theaters decided to merge their already existing businesses. Since then it has opened 58 locations with over 554 screens. It is also the 5th largest Theater Chain in America. It is currently located at 1614 S Main St, Blacksburg, VA 24060

image.alt: Image of seats inside the theater

li.p: Beautiful dark tones set the color schemes
Spacious Seating with the ability to recline chair
Large, bright screens with clear audio
Bring your own food. It's a bit overpriced
